_source.text: [6] The word "Hell" was used four times in The Original Series , the other three being " Space Seed ", when Kirk quotes Milton, " It is better to rule in Hell than serve in Heaven ", " The Alternative Factor ", when Lazarus tells his counterpart, " I'll chase you into the very fires of hell! ", and " The Doomsday Machine ", when Decker describes the berserker as "right out of hell."
